Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.CLI

Class CLIScreenFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CLI.CLIScreenFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreenFactory
    public class CLIScreenFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScreenFactory
    This is the ScreenFactory of the CLI. This class is responsible for creating the instances of all the other screens
